note:
In alpha: Kinetic Solitaire, a 2D puzzler set in a casino aboard a derelict aircraft carrier. This was a distraction project and I’m setting it aside for a while.

In progress: UniTime (formerly known as Time Cards). Basically the game I have to make before I die — a logically consistent time travel card combat wrapped in a bureaucratic satire.

a card combat game with time travel mechanics and a sci-fi bureaucratic satire.
